segments.text: Oh dear, this kitchen is in quite a state.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see water overflowing from the sink, and that poor woman is just standing there, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so focused on her task, completely unaware of the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's really sad to see her standing in that puddle of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, trying to get cookies from the jar, are going to get into trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks so unstable, and the boy is going to fall if he's not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices the water and the children before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, it's a shame the inside of the house is in such disarray.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really feel for that woman, she seems to have her hands full.
segments.speaker: PAR
